homeHeroHeader: The world of <1>pets</1> in your pocket
homeHeroSubHeader: Where you can find a furry friend
featuresTagLineText: Create profiles for pets to put them up for adoption or to look for partners for breeding.
featureAdoptionText: Find a new pet at the right time.
featureMatingText: Choose an animal to partner yours. Find a pet to grow your family.
featureLostText: Post your missing pet, including photos, location, and other information.
featureFoundText: Post about a missing pet that you've found.
synopsisText: Litten helps connect people looking for a new pet with a suitable owner or breeder. The app helps an adopter find a pet that matches their lifestyle, considering factors like breed, gender, color, age, and a description of the owner. It also helps to look for a breeding partner for your pet or a breeding pair.
careersText: We're always looking for talented minds to join our quest.<1/>Take a look at the positions we're currently looking to fill.

notFoundContent: Either you aren't cool enough to visit this page or it doesn't exist... like your social life.
upgradeBrowserNotice: You are using an outdated browser that we do not currently support. Please consider upgrading to a newer and safer browsing technology.
